_sText:
Fire Extinguisher w/ Thrust

Consists of a Fire Extinguisher, that when you damage it will spray the substance of the canister and also exert thrust from the top of the model. A sound is also played when this event occurs, a Jet sound as if it was leaking. (Note: A real fire extinguisher will be under pressure) This can be used for alot of map types as an effect. Please rate, assess, and tell me what you think.
